subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 25 points to lead the host Liberty to an 87-72 win over the Indiana Fever, ending the Liberty’s (1-5) longest winless start in franchise history.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 25 points to lead the host Liberty to an 87-72 win over the Indiana Fever, ending the Liberty’s (1-5) longest winless start in franchise history.
